00007 namespace CALICE {
00008 
00018   class BitSet {
00019 
00020   public:
00021 
00027     int getInt() const { return _bits; }
00028 
00034     void setBits(const int value) {
00035       _bits = value;
00036     }
00037 
00044     std::vector<int> getIntVec() const {
00045       std::vector<int> result;
00046       for (unsigned int i=_maxBits; i>0; --i) {
00047         result.push_back(getBit(i-1));
00048       }
00049       return result;
00050     }
00051 
00055     void clear() {
00056       _bits = 0x0;
00057     }
00058 
00059   protected:
00060 
00069     BitSet(const unsigned int maxBits, const int value = 0x0) {
00070       _bits = value;
00071       _maxBits = maxBits;
00072     }
00073 
00080     bool getBit(unsigned int bitNo ) const { int bits = _bits; return ( (bits >> bitNo) & 0x01 ); }
00087     void setBit(unsigned int bitNo, bool state) {
00088       int value = (0x01 << bitNo);
00089       if (state) _bits = _bits | value;
00090       else _bits = _bits & ~value;
00091     }
00092 
00093   private:
00094     int _bits;
00095     unsigned int _maxBits;
00096   };

00100 } // end namespace CALICE
